meta.title: Bug Loop | Blog of a Professional E-book Author
meta.description: A blog containing the unique reflections of a person who deeply cherishes the medium of writing.

profile.profile-bio1: A lifelong learner majoring in Computer Science and Hacking & Information Security at Hanyang Cyber University. Enjoys writing as a means of genuine, thoughtful communication.
profile.profile-bio2: After earning a B.A. in Composition from Hanyang University, he studied Acoustics for two years in the Engineering Science program at Le Mans University (France). Passionate about creating unbounded music and the tools (virtual instruments) that make it possible.
profile.profile-bio3: Severely visually impaired, he studied Physics at Le Mans University and Sound Design at Le Mans Beaux-Arts before leaving due to adjustment difficulties. He now focuses on digital health and happiness through brain games and wellness tools.

Things I Love

  • Cats

© 2025 Dongsun Hanâ€™s Blog

panel.title: E-book Author Bug Loop
panel.body: A book is like a film subtitle. To properly read a book, one must have either experience (memory) or the desire for experience (imagination). Traditional books exist in a form where the text is laid out in one direction. However, e-books are different. This characteristic allows one to jump from the first page to the last page instantly, and also to cite other media like audio or video between the characters. E-books are not merely books that are easy to copy and publish. They are more than that! This blog is a record of the journey to explore that value.
